fields.name: ApplicationPrincipals
fields.description: The list of the application principals. This is a legacy parameter and is no longer used.

fields.name: DataMaskingState
fields.description: The state of the data masking policy.

fields.name: ExemptPrincipals
fields.description: The list of the exempt principals. Specifies the semicolon-separated list of database users for which the data masking policy does not apply. The specified users receive data results without masking for all of the database queries.

fields.name: MaskingLevel
fields.description: The masking level. This is a legacy parameter and is no longer used.
